channel.title: Webclient... and html site?
channel.description:
How do I make a webclient for my server? I have the client ready, but I can only make a free website, since I don't want to pay.
I can only figure out how to make forum sites... can anyone tell me how to make a site that i can edit its html?

item.title: Webclient... and html site?
item.dc:creator: @Brenz Brenz
item.description:
@Brenz wrote:

To edit HTML u normally have to pay as free hosts dont usually provide FTP access.

If u want very cheap hosting check out http://moparhoster.co.uk

Brendan

Read full topic
